meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by first-year Biology classes and academic expectations
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Bridget, a first-year Biology major. I’ve taken two biology classes so far and really enjoyed them, but I’m also in a honors-level English course and a philosophy class. My academic load is heavy, and I’m feeling like I’m not keeping up with everything. I’m worried that I’m not going to be able to keep up with this major, and I’m starting to feel really anxious and stressed. I’m not sure if I’m doing well enough to succeed in this major, and I’m worried about whether I’m even qualified to be a Biology major.
